{{Description|In order to pursue the great dream in the morning mist and sea of clouds, the warriors who soared the skies never rested for a moment.<br>In the depths of the distant sea of fog, the story of the ruined city occupied by the devilish dragon guarding that which is forbidden, and above the clouds, the empty ark forgotten in legend awaits the arrival of new guests...}}
'''Facing the Windborne Cliff and City of Flowing Ash''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.2]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* After the Version 5.2 update – 2025/02/11 17:59

===Summary===
* New areas in [[Natlan]] including [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], [[Quahuacan Cliff]], and [[Ochkanatlan]] will be available after the Version 5.2 update.
* Complete the corresponding exploration missions within the specified duration to obtain an additional reward of [[Primogem]]s ×400.
